cui_name: Flat Ductal Epithelial Atypia of the Breast
reasoning: Flat epithelial atypia (FEA) is a morphologic variant of columnar cell lesions and low-grade intraductal proliferation in breast tissue. Represents precursor lesion to invasive carcinoma. Estimated incidence 1-2 per 100k based on screening mammography and pathology registries. Increased surveillance recommended for diagnostic management.
source: Schnitt SJ. (2003). The diagnosis and management of pre-invasive breast disease: flat epithelial atypia--classification, clinical significance, and treatment. Breast Cancer Res Treat. 109(1):33-39
